bike.description: A2-SL Custom Butted Alloy w/Flattened top tube & Integrated 1 1/4"L tapered head tube, Oversized 34.9mm round seat tube, PIIS BB-86 shell, Double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: A2-SL Custom Butted Aluminum w/Forged road dropout with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: FC-440 Cross Carbon Monocoque w/Tapered steerer & Alloy drop out
FSA SLK Light Hollow Carbon MegaExo 2pc, 7075 CNC 34/50T Chainring
Shimano Ultegra STI shifter/brake combo,  20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval W-530 Aero Alloy Clincher Wheelset, 30mm rim - 700c
Continental Speed King Cross, 700x35c, Wire Bead
Shimano Ultegra STI w/Tektro Top Mounts
FSA No.44 CX 1 1/8"U-1 1/4"L Lower Sealed, Cartridge Bearing
Oval SR-700 Sweep w/ Ti Rail
Oval R-700 DB Alloy Two bolt 350x31.6mm
